title: Analytics Manager, Business Intelligence & Reporting

pay_input_ranges.title: An estimate of the current salary range for US-based employees is
pay_input_ranges.blurb:
Outlined below is a reasonable estimate of H&H’s compensation range for this role.  

H&H also offers a comprehensive Total Rewards package that includes equity grants of restricted stock (RSU’s) so that H&H employees own a piece of our company.

The actual amount will take into account a range of factors that are considered in making compensation decisions including but not limited to, skill sets, experience and training, licensure and certifications, and location.

Consult with your Recruiter during any potential screening to determine a more targeted range based on the job-related factors. We don’t ever want the pay range to act as a deterrent from you applying!

content:
Hims & Hers Health, Inc. (better known as Hims & Hers) is the leading health and wellness platform, on a mission to help the world feel great through the power of better health. We are revolutionizing telehealth for providers and their patients alike. Making personalized solutions accessible is of paramount importance to Hims & Hers and we are focused on continued innovation in this space. Hims & Hers offers nonprescription products and access to highly personalized prescription solutions for a variety of conditions related to mental health, sexual health, hair care, skincare, heart health, and more.
Hims & Hers is a public company, traded on the NYSE under the ticker symbol “HIMS”. To learn more about the brand and offerings, you can visit hims.com and forhers.com, or visit our investor site. For information on the company’s outstanding benefits, culture, and its talent-first flexible/remote work approach, see below and visit www.hims.com/careers-professionals.​​About the Role:
As the Manager of Business Intelligence & Reporting at Hims & Hers, you will have the opportunity to shape and expand our reporting suite for our executive audience. Your expertise in data visualization, data-driven decision making, and proficiency in BI software such as Looker and Tableau will enable us to enhance the quality of our decision-making processes across the entire Hims & Hers Enterprise.
In this pivotal role, your skills in data storytelling and deep understanding of Looker & data visualization will play a vital role in empowering our organization to make well-informed decisions based on trusted and standardized data products. As a fully remote position, you will directly report to the Senior Director of Data Solutions, fostering a collaborative and supportive work environment.
Join us in this opportunity to revolutionize the way we leverage data at Hims & Hers and drive impactful outcomes for our business.
You Will:

Design and create visually appealing and intuitive Looker dashboards and reports that communicate complex data insights to an executive audience
Collaborate with stakeholders to understand their data needs and translate them into meaningful visualizations
Develop dashboards and a dashboard suite that tell compelling stories and highlight key insights, enabling executives to make informed business decisions
Apply best practices and design principles to ensure clarity, consistency, and usability of our dashboards
Continuously improve and refine existing Looker dashboards and reports to enhance their visual appeal and effectiveness in communicating insights
Work closely with data engineers to ensure data accuracy and integrity within Looker, and optimize the performance of visualizations
Stay updated on the latest trends and advancements in data visualization techniques, tools, and design principles
Provide guidance and training to team members on best practices

At a Minimum You Have:

Strong experience in data visualization (minimum of 3+ years of experience), including designing and building visually stunning dashboards and reports
Minimum of 3+ years working with BI software (Looker or Tableau) and a strong understanding of it’s features and capabilities for creating engaging visualizations
Experience building custom visualizations and extensions in Looker using Javascript, React or D3. Or related experience building custom visualizations in other applications.
Excellent knowledge of data visualization best practices, design principles, and usability concepts
Ability to transform complex data sets into clear and concise visualizations that effectively convey insights
Proficiency in data storytelling, presenting data in a narrative format to drive understanding and decision-making
Experience working with executive-level stakeholders and delivering insights that support strategic decision-making
3+ years experience and strong knowledge of SQL and data manipulation
Excellent communication skills, with the ability to effectively communicate data-driven insights to non-technical audiences
Passion for creating visually appealing and impactful dashboards

A Big Plus If You Have:

Like to tinker and code (Python/R)
Have a solid portfolio of past work that demonstrates a strong visual eye
Are knowledgeable about statistics and data science 
2+ years of leading analytics teams with direct reports
Proficiency in Looker and a deep understanding of its features and capabilities for creating engaging visualizations
Extensive experience working with Data Engineering
Experience updating and maintaining DBT pipelines
Experience working with Databricks

Our Benefits (there are more but here are some highlights):

Competitive salary & equity compensation for full-time roles
Unlimited PTO, company holidays, and quarterly mental health days
Comprehensive health benefits including medical, dental & vision, and parental leave
Employee Stock Purchase Program (ESPP)
Employee discounts on hims & hers & Apostrophe online products
401k benefits with employer matching contribution
Offsite team retreats

#LI-RemoteOutlined below is a reasonable estimate of H&H’s compensation range for this role.  H&H also offers a comprehensive Total Rewards package that includes equity grants of restricted stock (RSU’s) so that H&H employees own a piece of our company.The actual amount will take into account a range of factors that are considered in making compensation decisions including but not limited to, skill sets, experience and training, licensure and certifications, and location.Consult with your Recruiter during any potential screening to determine a more targeted range based on the job-related factors. We don’t ever want the pay range to act as a deterrent from you applying! An estimate of the current salary range for US-based employees is$125,000—$165,000 USDWe are focused on building a diverse and inclusive workforce. If you’re excited about this role, but do not meet 100% of the qualifications listed above, we encourage you to apply.
Hims is an Equal Opportunity Employer and considers applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, orientation, national origin, age, disability, genetics or any other basis forbidden under federal, state, or local law. Hims considers all qualified applicants in accordance with the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance.
Hims & hers is committed to providing reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities and disabled veterans in our job application procedures. If you need assistance or an accommodation due to a disability, you may contact us at accommodations@forhims.com. Please do not send resumes to this email address.

compliance.description: <p>PUBLIC BURDEN STATEMENT: According to the Paperwork Reduction Act of 1995 no persons are required to respond to a collection of information unless such collection displays a valid OMB control number. This survey should take about 5 minutes to complete.</p>

demographic_questions.description:
At Hims & Hers, we seek to establish an inclusive environment and are committed to building a team that reflects the unique perspectives, life experiences and varying backgrounds of the diverse populations that make up our customer base. To help us ensure we are meeting our equal employment obligations under U.S. employment law and identify areas of improvement in our process, we invite all U.S.-based candidates to complete the following demographic questions (if you are based outside of the United States, please select “I don't wish to answer”). 

 

Your responses will be anonymized and reviewed in aggregate only and will not in any way be associated with your application or used in the hiring process.  We hope that you will voluntarily complete this form and support us in our inclusion efforts.

questions.label: What gender do you most closely identify with?
Please select the race and/or ethnic identities you most identify with:
Do you identify as having a disability?

answer_options.label: No, I do not have a disability

questions.label: Are you a veteran/have you served in the military?

answer_options.label: No, I am not a veteran

questions.label: Please share a link to your Portfolio (Looker or Tableau Visualization Examples)
Walk me through a recent exec dashboard you've designed. What was the story it told, and how did you ensure it was both visually appealing and informative?
Have you built custom visualizations and extensions in Looker using Javascript, React or D3? If so, can you explain what you have built?
